mapper.insert: insert into product (storeid,productname,price,quantity,productintro,ispublic,categoryid) values ((select id from store where userid = (select id from users where realid = #{realId})), #{productName},#{price},#{quantity},#{productIntro},#{isPublic},#{categoryId})
mapper.select: select * from product where storeid = #{storeId} order by id desc
